title: Monday Night Games , Time for Tua, and TNF Preview
itunes:title: Monday Night Games , Time for Tua, and TNF Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, and Marc Sessler start by recapping the two games on Monday starting with the Chiefs win over the Bills (3:59). The Cowboys lost a brutal home game and the players are starting to voice opinions that they're not happy (12:02). Handsome Hank stops by to talk about the Dolphins moving forward with QB Tua (28:37) and then the heroes preview the NFC East matchup for TNF (40:56).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
